name: Any Fully Custom Pokémon
description:
Design your own custom Pokémon. One Pokémon custom designed by you.

The stats you can choose include:
, IV Spread, EV Spread, Level, Gender, Shiny / Non-Shiny, Tera Type, Nature, Move Set, Ability, Held Item, Nickname, Trainer ID + Trainer SID (if you know it) OT, + OT Gender
